import React, { useState } from 'react' function Login() { const [code, setCode]=useState(''); const [username, setUsername] = useState(''); const [userpwd, setUserpwd] = useState('') const checkCredentials = async () => { console.log("inside checkCredentials"); await fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8086/api/auth/login', { method: 'GET', body: JSON.stringify({ "username" : username, "password": userpwd }) }) } return (
